thread.section_title: Clothes2order.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.clothes2order.com | 4 of 316
thread.title: gary williamson

author: gary williamson
title: gary williamson
text: The web site ordering is fairly easy. I wanted 10 polo shirts of differing sizes with an embroidered log and different names and numbers on the back. It all worked out fine - I had to clarify a couple of things with customer service and they were very helpful. The polo shirts arrived on time, to specifications and look really good. The price was quite reasonable considering I only wanted a relatively small order. I would use them again without hesitation.
